metadata.name: Debug Shenanigans
metadata.description:
This mod requires REPENTOGON. Press the tilde key to open the new debug console and menu. There's a new Shenanigans option that will let you enable/disable debug options.
You can set these from the console ("debug 1" - "debug 14"), but sometimes being able to see which are enabled at a glance comes in handy.
You can also view/toggle game/level/room state. Be careful with these. The game normally sets them as appropriate.
More info: [list] [*][url=https://wofsauge.github.io/IsaacDocs/rep/enums/GameStateFlag.html]Game state[/url] [*][url=https://wofsauge.github.io/IsaacDocs/rep/enums/LevelStateFlag.html]Level state[/url] [*][url=https://wofsauge.github.io/IsaacDocs/rep/enums/RoomDescriptor.html]Room state[/url] [/list]
Update: You can now add a message to the window title.
